dt: {bc}one of the later Hindu or Buddhist scriptures dealing especially with techniques and rituals including meditative and sexual practices
{bc}the rituals or practices outlined in the tantra

et: Sanskrit, literally, warp, from {it}tanoti{/it} he stretches, weaves; akin to Greek {it}teinein{/it} to stretch {ma}{mat|thin|}{/ma}
shortdef: one of the later Hindu or Buddhist scriptures dealing especially with techniques and rituals including meditative and sexual practices; also : the rituals or practices outlined in the tantra
